scripts.build: npm run preprocess && npx @marp-team/marp-cli --html --engine ./engine.js -o slides/presentation.html slides/presentation.processed.md
scripts.export: npm run preprocess && npx @marp-team/marp-cli --html --engine ./engine.js --pptx --allow-local-files -o slides/presentation.pptx slides/presentation.processed.md
scripts.export:pdf: npm run preprocess && npx @marp-team/marp-cli --html --engine ./engine.js --pdf --allow-local-files -o slides/presentation.pdf slides/presentation.processed.md
